text: Dennis Edwards (February 3, 1943 â€“ February 1, 2018) was an American soul and R&B; singer. He the lead singer in The Temptations, on Motown Records. He was born in Fairfield, Alabama. Edwards died of a stroke as complications from meningitis in Chicago, Illinois on February 1, 2018 at the age of 74.Dennis Edwards, Former Lead Singer of The Temptations, Has Died at 75 Years Old Matt Friedlander, "Former Temptations singer Dennis Edwards dead at 74", ABC News, February 2, 2018 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from meningitis Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Disease- related deaths in Chicago Category:American R&B; singers Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American soul musicians Category:People from Fairfield, Alabama Category:Singers from Alabama Category:Musicians from Alabama
title: Dennis Edwards
